org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class opencv_core.RNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.RNG
  • Enclosing class:
    opencv_core

    public static class opencv_core.RNG
extends Pointer
    Random Number Generator The class implements RNG using Multiply-with-Carry algorithm
